author: A_Brickset_user
review: I missed this set at first, and after it was dis-continued, my mother called and asked the catalog service if there were any more of this set. One year later, TLC re-releases it! This set is a great add on to a Western town. The left side of the jail flies off when you insert a dynamite piece through a slot, which hits a spring lever, which pops up and bumps the wall. There is a safe, a piece (same size as dynamite) that represents a wanted poster, offering a $500 reward for Flatfoot Thompson, who I believe is the bandit in red in this set, a realistic Western leaning chair, a horse, and desk thats top lifts off to reveal gold coins. Minifigs are a sheriff, deputy/cowboy, bandit in green, and a bandit in red, who both have very detailed facial expressions.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: almost as good as gold city junction
review: this set is amazing! there are four minifigs. they are a sherrif,a deputy who is handsome and 2 scary and ugly bandits. there is a wanted poster for flatfoot thompson who looks like the red bandit there is a gambling bandit who is famous because he is in so many sets. nice jail. the wall blows off. a good idea to make a sherrifs office.

author: legoman4694
title: good for those of us who were to young when the origional was realeased
review:
i was very young when the first western sets were made but in 2002 i was thrilled. these sets are the same as the origionals and i ot this and rapid river village for my birth day. this set is awesome. it comes with four guys. the sheriff, the deputy, a bandit who looks like he plays cards and cheats, and a bandit who looks very disgusting and like he hasnt showered in days (of course i dont think there were showers back then). on the wanted poster his name is flatfoot thomsen. the jail door explodes when you put dynamite in it due to a springtheres a secreat compartment for money in the office and a barrel for hiding. 

conclusion-get this set if you like western legos. its a great addition to any collection. 10/10
